verbose_text: Furthermore, the expression in U2OS cells of Poleta mutants lacking the PCNA interacting peptide (DeltaPIP) or ubiquitin binding domain (DeltaUBZ), which are required for Poleta focus formation, completely abolished its telomeric localization (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: Poleta mutants lacking the PCNA-interacting peptide (DeltaPIP) or ubiquitin-binding domain (DeltaUBZ), which are required for Poleta focus formation                           , completely abolished its telomeric localization
